title: Lamb with fresh peas (Agnello con piselli freschi)
description: Gennaro Contaldo shows you a homemade Italian family dish of tender lamb and fresh peas.
ingredients: 1 kg/2lb 2oz boned lamb shoulder, cut into large chunks
salt and freshly ground black pepper
400g/14oz potatoes, skin on, cut into quarters
1-2 loaves crusty bread, sliced and toasted
